channel.title: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Studying Service Accessibility in Towns and Villages
item.description: Settlements – cities, towns and villages – provide jobs and access to services for their own residents and other people living nearby.

item.title: Reaching Digital Deserts – Extending Access to Broadband Has Never Been So Important
item.description: The internet is crucial for us to access information, services, job opportunities, education, and more. However, while urban communities flourish in the online world, many rural communities have been left behind when it comes to ensuring fast and reliable internet access.
